entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a delighted elf who receives a maroon sweater from Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who gives Dobby the maroon sweater.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron helps Harry prepare to leave and loads his pockets with cream cakes and pies.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione refuses snacks offered by the elves due to their bowing and curtsying.

entities.name: the elves
entities.description: The surrounding elves offer snacks to Harry, Ron, and Hermione as they prepare to leave.

relationships.description: Harry gives Dobby the maroon sweater.
Ron helps Harry prepare to leave and loads his pockets with cream cakes and pies.
Hermione refuses snacks offered by the elves due to their bowing and curtsying.
